entities.label: AASB S2 Climate-related Disclosures
entities.description: Australian Sustainability Reporting Standard for climate-related disclosures

entities.label: Australian Accounting Standards Board
entities.description: Australian Government entity that develops, issues and maintains Australian Sustainability Reporting Standards

entities.label: IFRS S2 Climate-related Disclosures
entities.description: International Sustainability Disclosure Standard for climate-related disclosures issued by ISSB

entities.label: AASB S1 General Requirements for Disclosure of Sustainability-related Financial Information
entities.description: Voluntary Standard addressing sustainability-related financial disclosures in general

entities.label: Scope 1 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions from sources owned or controlled by the entity

entities.label: Scope 2 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy

entities.label: Scope 3 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Other indirect greenhouse gas emissions in the value chain

entities.label: Climate-related Risks
entities.description: Risks that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's cash flows, access to finance or cost of capital

entities.label: Climate-related Opportunities
entities.description: Opportunities that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's cash flows, access to finance or cost of capital

entities.label: Governance
entities.description: Climate-related governance disclosure requirements

entities.label: Strategy
entities.description: Climate-related strategy disclosure requirements including scenario analysis

entities.label: Risk Management
entities.description: Climate-related risk management disclosure requirements

entities.label: Metrics and Targets
entities.description: Climate-related metrics and targets disclosure requirements

entities.label: Scenario Analysis
entities.description: Analysis of potential climate-related scenarios and their impacts

entities.label: 1 January 2025
entities.description: Primary application date for annual reporting periods

entities.label: 1 July 2026
entities.description: Secondary application date for certain entity classes

entities.label: 1 July 2027
entities.description: Tertiary application date for certain entity classes

entities.label: International Sustainability Standards Board
entities.description: International body that issues IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards

entities.label: Corporations Act 2001
entities.description: Australian legislation that sets out which entities are required to comply with AASB S2

entities.label: AASB S2 Climate-related Disclosures
entities.description: Australian Sustainability Reporting Standard requiring disclosure of climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Climate-related Risks
entities.description: Risks to which the entity is exposed, including physical and transition risks

entities.label: Climate-related Physical Risks
entities.description: Physical risks arising from climate change

entities.label: Climate-related Transition Risks
entities.description: Risks arising from transition to lower-carbon economy

entities.label: Climate-related Opportunities
entities.description: Opportunities available to the entity related to climate change

entities.label: Governance Body
entities.description: Board, committee or equivalent body charged with oversight of climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Management Role
entities.description: Management's role in governance processes for climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Climate-related Targets
entities.description: Targets set related to climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Remuneration Policies
entities.description: Policies that may include climate-related performance metrics

entities.label: Business Model
entities.description: Entity's business model affected by climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Value Chain
entities.description: Entity's value chain affected by climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Climate-related Transition Plan
entities.description: Plan for managing transition related to climate change

entities.label: Cash Flows
entities.description: Entity's cash flows that may be affected by climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Cost of Capital
entities.description: Entity's cost of capital that may be affected by climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Australian Accounting Standards Board
entities.description: Body responsible for making Australian Sustainability Reporting Standards

entities.label: Climate-related Risks
entities.description: Risks arising from climate change that may affect an entity's financial position, performance and cash flows

entities.label: Climate-related Opportunities
entities.description: Opportunities arising from climate change that may affect an entity's financial position, performance and cash flows

entities.label: Financial Position
entities.description: Entity's financial position as reported in financial statements

entities.label: Financial Performance
entities.description: Entity's financial performance for the reporting period

entities.label: Cash Flows
entities.description: Entity's cash flows for the reporting period

entities.label: Climate-related Scenario Analysis
entities.description: Analysis method used to assess climate resilience under different climate scenarios

entities.label: Climate Resilience
entities.description: Entity's ability to withstand and adapt to climate-related changes, developments and uncertainties

entities.label: Capital Expenditure
entities.description: Planned capital expenditure related to climate strategy implementation

entities.label: Lower-carbon Economy Revenue
entities.description: Revenue from products and services aligned with a lower-carbon economy

entities.label: Climate Adaptation Expenses
entities.description: Expenses associated with climate adaptation or mitigation

entities.label: Physical Damage Costs
entities.description: Costs arising from physical damage to assets from climate events

entities.label: Carrying Amounts of Assets and Liabilities
entities.description: Carrying amounts of assets and liabilities at risk of material adjustment due to climate-related risks

entities.label: Climate Mitigation Investments
entities.description: Current and planned investments in climate-related mitigation

entities.label: Climate Adaptation Investments
entities.description: Current and planned investments in climate-related adaptation

entities.label: Business Model
entities.description: Entity's business model and its resilience to climate-related changes

entities.label: Climate Strategy
entities.description: Entity's strategy to manage climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Financial Resources
entities.description: Availability and flexibility of existing financial resources to respond to climate effects

entities.label: Scope 3 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Absolute gross Scope 3 greenhouse gas emissions including upstream and downstream emissions generated during the reporting period

entities.label: Financed Emissions
entities.description: Category 15 emissions or emissions associated with investments from financial activities

entities.label: Financed Emissions - Scope 1
entities.description: Absolute gross financed emissions disaggregated by Scope 1

entities.label: Financed Emissions - Scope 2
entities.description: Absolute gross financed emissions disaggregated by Scope 2

entities.label: Financed Emissions - Scope 3
entities.description: Absolute gross financed emissions disaggregated by Scope 3

entities.label: Assets Under Management in Financed Emissions
entities.description: Total amount of assets under management included in the financed emissions disclosure

entities.label: Percentage of Total AUM
entities.description: Percentage of entity's total AUM included in financed emissions

entities.label: Secondary Data
entities.description: Activity or emissions data that is timely and representative of the entity's value chain activity

entities.label: Verified Data
entities.description: Scope 3 emissions data that has been internally or externally verified through on-site checking, reviewing calculations, or cross-checking

entities.label: Climate-Related Risks
entities.description: Risks including credit risk, market risk, reputational risk and other financial and operational risks associated with greenhouse gas emissions

entities.label: Asset Management
entities.description: Financial activity requiring disclosure of financed emissions

entities.label: Commercial Banking
entities.description: Financial activity requiring disclosure of financed emissions

entities.label: Insurance
entities.description: Financial activity requiring disclosure of financed emissions

entities.label: Value Chain Activity
entities.description: Activities within the entity's value chain used for measuring Scope 3 emissions

entities.label: Scope 1 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Absolute gross greenhouse gas emissions generated during the reporting period

entities.label: Scope 2 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Absolute gross greenhouse gas emissions generated during the reporting period

entities.label: Scope 3 Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Absolute gross greenhouse gas emissions generated during the reporting period, including Category 15 emissions and financed emissions

entities.label: Location-based Scope 2 Emissions
entities.description: Location-based Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions with contractual instruments information

entities.label: Assets Vulnerable to Climate-related Transition Risks
entities.description: Amount and percentage of assets or business activities vulnerable to climate-related transition risks

entities.label: Assets Vulnerable to Climate-related Physical Risks
entities.description: Amount and percentage of assets or business activities vulnerable to climate-related physical risks

entities.label: Assets Aligned with Climate-related Opportunities
entities.description: Amount and percentage of assets or business activities aligned with climate-related opportunities

entities.label: Capital Deployment for Climate
entities.description: Amount of capital expenditure, financing or investment deployed towards climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Internal Carbon Price
entities.description: Price for each metric tonne of greenhouse gas emissions used to assess costs
entities.unit: price per metric tonne of GHG emissions

entities.label: Climate-linked Executive Remuneration
entities.description: Percentage of executive management remuneration linked to climate-related considerations

entities.label: Climate-related Targets
entities.description: Quantitative and qualitative climate-related targets including greenhouse gas emissions targets

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Protocol: A Corporate Accounting and Reporting Standard (2004)
entities.description: Measurement standard for greenhouse gas emissions

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Protocol Corporate Value Chain (Scope 3) Accounting and Reporting Standard (2011)
entities.description: Standard for Scope 3 emissions categories

entities.label: Consolidated Accounting Group
entities.description: Parent and its consolidated subsidiaries

entities.label: Other Investees
entities.description: Associates, joint ventures and unconsolidated subsidiaries
